message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.

I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $12,000 is quite a bit lower than what I'm looking for. Could you do $17,000? That would make it worthwhile for me.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm thinking $14,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
